metadata.Title: CVE-2008-4392 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: dnscache in Daniel J. Bernstein djbdns 1.05 does not prevent simultaneous identical outbound DNS queries, which makes it easier for remote attackers to spoof DNS responses, as demonstrated by a spoofed A record in the Additional section of a response to a Start of Authority (SOA) query.

notes.Note: sbeattie> debian attempted to mitigate the issue somewhat in 1:1.05-6 (lucid and newer) but the issue still stands

criterions.comment: djbdns package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
